Oh is this another one of those fake vanillas with offscreen NTR of a cumdump slut sleeping with a beta cuck and giving him every STD known to man? Then people going "Aw it's so wholesome" just cause we the reader do not see the FMC getting creampied offscreen by other men

teenacity translation,what a load of bs.Why would he want to be together with a cheating bitch in the first place?Also,"ShE iSnT sOmeOnE tHaT Will SleEp ArOunD"yet she lie and cheat with her bf then fuck a guy like a hoe craving dicks after a few minutes XD

This is perfect. They're childhood friends who haven't seen each other in years. She shows up and wants to have sex with virgin MC. She keeps mentioning her current boyfriend during sex. This pisses MC off, which makes him go on the offensive, magically instantly getting good at sex, and corrects the slut. He tries to get her to break up with her current boyfriend, but ultimately fails and they end up as just sex friends. In the last page she implies that MC is someone special to her and she's not someone who will sleep around with other guys, hinting that they might end up together. I hope there's a continuation. Kuro gyarus are the best.
